title: Opinion: I took part in a 2012 psilocybin trial. What I’m seeing now horrifies me
description: “I took part in a 2012 psilocybin trial. What I’m seeing now horrifies me,” writes Erica Rex, author of the new book “Seeing What Is There.”
content: “I took part in a 2012 psilocybin trial. What I’m seeing now horrifies me,” writes Erica Rex, author of the new book “Seeing What Is There.”
